Alternate versions

For systems that present language based content, may need alternative versions of the content (iconography, simplified, summarized, etc.)

Comment on this item

Notes

This includes both the alternative versions from the author perspective and the need to allow Assistive Technology to present alternatives.

Mappings

Required abilityAccessibility characteristicSupport needed
Language skillsLanguage-based contentAlternative
Language skillsLanguage-based contentAssistive technology

  • Reference: 5-2-2-e to have simplified text
  • Reference: Abbreviations

  • Reference: Unusual Words
  • Reference: 4.8.2 Provide Alternative Content for Complex Information and Tasks (Pattern)
